title: Gigi Hadid makes a statement in a sweatsuit that reads 'boys lie' after split from Tyler Cameron
text:
She let her clothes do the talking.

Gigi Hadid made quite a statement with her clothing when she was spotted out and about in New York City on Thursday.

The 24-year-old model was dressed down in a matching sweatsuit after leaving a photoshoot in the city.

Sending a message: Gigi Hadid made quite a statement with her 'boys lie' clothing when she was spotted out and about in New York City on Thursday

Rocking a classic off-duty-model look, Gigi pulled her blonde locks back in a sleek low bun and wore a trendy pair of wire rimmed sunglasses.

Her matching sweatsuit was a muted teal tone and featured baggy pants and a crew neck oversized sweatshirt with an angel on the front and the words 'boys lie, goodbye.'

The $165 ensemble is made by female empowerment label, Boys Lie, which was created by two women who'd both gotten over recent breakups.

'Just smile and wave as you are saying goodbye to the boy who made you cry,' the outfit's description reads on their website. 'Trust us, you’re better off without him.'

Speak up: Her matching sweatsuit was a muted teal tone and featured baggy pants and a crew neck oversized sweatshirt with an angel on the front and the words 'boys lie, goodbye'

Are you listening? Gigi might be sending a subtle message to her newly minted ex, Bachelor star Tyler Cameron

Gigi might be sending a subtle message to Bachelor star Tyler Cameron, with whom she recently called it quits.

The short-lived couple were first spotted together in early August.

They seemed inseparable to begin with - he even accompanied Gigi to her grandmother's funeral in the Netherlands in early September.

Earlier this month sources revealed that the pair's romance had quickly fizzled out and they were no longer together.

Shortlived: After being seemingly inseparable at the beginning, the pair split after just two months (Pictured together in August)

Tyler was a standout on Hannah Brown's season of The Bachelorette, where he came in second.

Gigi doesn't seem to be letting the breakup slow her down at all and has been busy working on the catwalks during Paris fashion week.

She recently returned home to the States and enjoyed a girls night out with her sister Bella to see Kacey Musgraves perform at Radio City Music Hall this week.
